tutorial.title: How to Fold Your Fanzine
tutorial.description: Follow these steps after printing your PDF.

0.title: Start with your printed sheet
0.description: Place the printed A4 sheet face-up on a flat surface with the landscape orientation.

1.title: Fold in half horizontally
1.description: Bring the top edge down to meet the bottom edge. Crease well along the center line.

2.title: Fold in half again
2.description: Bring the right edge to meet the left edge. Crease along the new fold.

3.title: Fold once more
3.description: Fold in half one more time in the same direction. You now have a small rectangle with 8 layers.

4.title: Unfold and cut the slit
4.description: Unfold the sheet completely. Cut along the red line — the horizontal center between the two middle columns only. Do NOT cut all the way across.

5.title: Fold and pop out the center
5.description: Fold the sheet in half horizontally again. Push the center sections outward through the slit to form a cross or diamond shape.

6.title: Fold into a booklet
6.description: Press the pages together and fold them into a booklet. The front cover should be on top. Your fanzine is ready!

whatIs.title: What is a Fanzine?
whatIs.description: A fanzine (fan magazine) is a small-circulation publication produced by enthusiasts. In this app, we help you create a 'mini-zine' from a single sheet of A4 paper. By folding and cutting it in a specific way, you get an 8-page booklet without needing staples or binding.
